flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Remote control is a very useful thing to use. Having an Arduino controlled with R/C is even more useful. Here you can learn how to use IR control in your projects for less than $5. You can control servo motors, led's and more!
guide.introduction_rendered: Remote control is a very useful thing to use. Having an Arduino controlled with R/C is even more useful. Here you can learn how to use IR control in your projects for less than $5. You can control servo motors, led's and more!
guide.summary: Learn how to interface an IR Receiver and an IR Remote to an Arduino.
guide.title: Using Infrared R/C with Arduino
